detectors.description:
GraSwapPairProxy (../../smart-contract-sanctuary/ethereum/contracts/mainnet/proxies/0.6.12/6b74e5c4137AfD6a7Dbd9d43c9d7af2A258e57A7_GraSwapFactory.sol/6b74e5c4137AfD6a7Dbd9d43c9d7af2A258e57A7_GraSwapFactory.sol#1658-1728) is an upgradeable proxy.
pairLogic was found in a different contract.
pairLogic is an address state variable.
GraSwapFactory.pairLogic (../../smart-contract-sanctuary/ethereum/contracts/mainnet/proxies/0.6.12/6b74e5c4137AfD6a7Dbd9d43c9d7af2A258e57A7_GraSwapFactory.sol/6b74e5c4137AfD6a7Dbd9d43c9d7af2A258e57A7_GraSwapFactory.sol#1744) gets value from a cross-contract call: IGraSwapFactory(address(_immuFactory)).pairLogic()
GraSwapFactory appears to be a Beacon contract for the proxy
Missing compatibility check in GraSwapFactory.setPairLogic(address)
To remove upgradeability, delete setPairLogic from GraSwapFactory
